text: Bernard William Jewry (27 September 1942 â€“ 23 October 2014), known as Alvin Stardust, was an English pop singer and stage actor. He first performed as Shane Fenton. He was best known for singles released in the 1970s and 1980s, including "My Coo Ca Choo", the UK Singles Chart-topper "Jealous Mind", and "I Feel Like Buddy Holly". Stardust was born in Muswell Hill, London. He was raised in Mansfield, Nottinghamshire. He died in Ifold, West Sussex, England from prostate cancer, aged 72. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from London Category:Cancer deaths in England Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:English rock guitarists Category:English rock singers Category:English stage actors Category:Musicians from Nottinghamshire Category:Singers from London
title: Alvin Stardust
